title: Impeachment, Trade & 2020 Elections
itunes:title: Impeachment, Trade & 2020 Elections
description:
Kevin spoke with Adrienne Elrod, Democratic Strategist, Former Director of Strategic Communications for the Hillary Clinton Presidential Campaign and Jack Kingston, Former Georgia Congressman.

They discussed House Speaker Nancy Pelosi today announcing she's requesting articles of impeachment against President Trump, U.S.-China trade talks, and Joe Biden's heated exchange with an elderly voter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
